author: zongaro
msg: Updated samples to use the JAXP transform API's, along with XSLTC's

class files and from there to load them.

author: zongaro

attribute to load precompiled stylesheets, instead of using the XSLTC Native
Also changed imports to import minimal number of classes and interfaces.
